articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';

Az √©vfordul√≥ a kapcsolatotok √ºnnepl√©s√©nek k√ºl√∂nleges alkalma. Ha n√©metul szeretn√©d kifejezni az √©rz√©seidet ezen a napon, ezek a kifejez√©sek seg√≠tenek.

Tov√°bbi romantikus kifejez√©sek√©rt n√©zd meg az [N√©met romantikus kifejez√©sek](/learn/hu/de/german-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion) √∫tmutat√≥nkat.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Herzlichen Gl√ºckwunsch!"
  translation="Gratul√°lok!"
  pronunciation="Ààh…õ Åtsl…™√ß…ôn Àà…°l èkv än É"
  context="Az esk√ºv≈ëi k√∂sz√∂nt√©s alapja."
/>

## Alapvet≈ë sz√≥kincs

Az √©vfordul√≥s k√∂sz√∂nt√©sek alapvet≈ë n√©met sz√≥kincse:

<VocabCard
  word="Hochzeit"
  translation="esk√ºv≈ë"
  pronunciation="Ààh…îœátsa…™t"
  example="Die Hochzeit war wundersch√∂n."
/>

| N√©met | Magyar | Haszn√°lat |
|---|---|---|
| Braut | menyasszony | A n≈ë |
| Br√§utigam | v≈ëleg√©ny | A f√©rfi |
| Gel√ºbde | fogadalmak | Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek |
| Zeremonie | szertart√°s | A hivatalos r√©sz |
| Empfang | fogad√°s | Az √ºnnepl√©s |
| Toast | k√∂sz√∂nt≈ë | Poh√°rk√∂sz√∂nt≈ë |

<CultureTip flag="üåç" title="N√©met kultur√°lis tippek">
A n√©met kult√∫r√°ban az √©vfordul√≥knak k√ºl√∂nleges jelent≈ës√©g√ºk van. Egyes helyeken hagyom√°nyos aj√°nd√©kokat adnak az √©vek sz√°m√°t√≥l f√ºgg≈ëen.
</CultureTip>

## Hasznos kifejez√©sek

### √âvfordul√≥s k√∂sz√∂nt√©sek

Az √©vfordul√≥ napj√°n mondd:

- **Herzlichen Gl√ºckwunsch!** - Gratul√°lok!
- **Minden nap jobban szeretlek** - Romantikus vallom√°s
- **K√∂sz√∂n√∂m, hogy velem vagy** - H√°l√°s szavak

### Hosszabb √ºzenetek
Ha t√∂bbet szeretn√©l mondani:

- **Veled minden nap k√ºl√∂nleges** - Romantikus
- **A legjobb d√∂nt√©s volt, hogy igentet mondtam** - Visszatekint≈ë

<VocabCard
  word="Flitterwochen"
  translation="n√°sz√∫t"
  pronunciation="Ààfl…™t…êÀåv…îxnÃ©"
  example="Sie sind in den Flitterwochen."
/>

## Gyakorlati helyzetek

| Helyzet | Mit mondj |
|---|---|
| Reggeli k√∂sz√∂nt√©s | Boldog √©vfordul√≥t k√≠v√°nok! |
| K√°rty√°ra | √çrj szem√©lyes √ºzenetet |
| Vacsor√°n√°l | Mondj k√∂sz√∂nt≈ët |
| Lefekv√©s el≈ëtt | Fejezd ki a h√°l√°dat |

<CultureTip flag="üí°" title="Hasznos tipp">
√çrd le el≈ëre, amit mondani szeretn√©l. Az √©vfordul√≥ √©rzelmes pillanat, √©s a le√≠rt szavak seg√≠tenek, hogy ne felejtsd el, amit mondani akarsz.
</CultureTip>

## √ñsszefoglal√≥ t√°bl√°zat

| Helyzet | N√©met kifejez√©s |
|---|---|
| Gratul√°ci√≥ | Herzlichen Gl√ºckwunsch! |
| Az esem√©ny | Hochzeit |
| A n≈ë | Braut |
| A f√©rfi | Br√§utigam |
| Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek | Gel√ºbde |

## Tov√°bbi tanul√°s

Ha tov√°bb szeretn√©d fejleszteni a n√©met nyelvtud√°sod, n√©zd meg ezeket a cikkeinket:

- [N√©met romantikus kifejez√©sek minden alkalomra](/learn/hu/de/german-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion)

Ezek a forr√°sok seg√≠tenek elm√©ly√≠teni a tud√°sod √©s magabiztosabb√° v√°lni a n√©met nyelvben.

articles.title: GramaticƒÉ EnglezƒÉ de BazƒÉ pentru √éncepƒÉtori: Ghid Complet
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Gramatica englezƒÉ este adesea consideratƒÉ mai simplƒÉ dec√¢t cea rom√¢neascƒÉ - nu existƒÉ declinƒÉri, genuri gramaticale sunt rare, iar conjugƒÉrile verbale sunt mult mai simple. Acest ghid √Æ»õi va prezenta fundamentele gramaticii engleze dintr-o perspectivƒÉ rom√¢neascƒÉ.

## Ordinea Cuvintelor √Æn Propozi»õie

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Subject + Verb + Object"
  translation="Subiect + Verb + Complement"
  pronunciation="sab-ject + verb + ob-ject"
  context="Structura de bazƒÉ a propozi»õiei √Æn englezƒÉ."
/>

√én englezƒÉ, ordinea cuvintelor este foarte importantƒÉ »ôi de obicei fixƒÉ:

| Rom√¢nƒÉ | EnglezƒÉ |
|--------|---------|
| Eu iubesc pe Maria | I love Maria |
| Maria mƒÉ iube»ôte | Maria loves me |
| Te iubesc | I love you |

<CultureTip title="Diferen»õƒÉ ImportantƒÉ" flag="üá¨üáß">
Spre deosebire de rom√¢nƒÉ, √Æn englezƒÉ NU po»õi schimba ordinea cuvintelor liber. "Maria I love" ar fi gre»ôit sau foarte poetic/arhaic. Ordinea standard este obligatorie.
</CultureTip>

## Articolele: A, An, The

### Articolul NehotƒÉr√¢t: A / An

<VocabCard
  word="A / An"
  translation="Un / O"
  pronunciation="a / en"
  example="I have a boyfriend. (Am un prieten.) / She is an amazing person. (Ea e o persoanƒÉ uimitoare.)"
/>

**Regula:**
- **A** se folose»ôte √Ænainte de consoane: a man, a house, a car
- **An** se folose»ôte √Ænainte de vocale: an apple, an hour, an honest person

### Articolul HotƒÉr√¢t: The

<VocabCard
  word="The"
  translation="Articolul hotƒÉr√¢t (similar cu -ul, -a din rom√¢nƒÉ)"
  pronunciation="the / thi"
  example="The man I love is kind. (BƒÉrbatul pe care √Æl iubesc este bun.)"
/>

**C√¢nd folosim THE:**
- C√¢nd vorbim despre ceva specific: "The book on the table" (Cartea de pe masƒÉ)
- C√¢nd contextul face clar la ce ne referim: "The sun is bright" (Soarele e strƒÉlucitor)
- Cu superlative: "The best partner" (Cel mai bun partener)

**C√¢nd NU folosim THE:**
- GeneralizƒÉri: "Love is beautiful" (Dragostea e frumoasƒÉ) - NU "The love"
- Cu nume de persoane: "Maria is here" - NU "The Maria"

## Pronumele Personale

<ConjugationTable
  verb="Pronume Personale"
  meaning="Personal Pronouns"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "I", polish: "eu", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "You", polish: "tu/voi", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "He", polish: "el", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "She", polish: "ea", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "It", polish: "el/ea (neutru)", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "We", polish: "noi", english: "subiect" },
    { person: "They", polish: "ei/ele", english: "subiect" }
  ]}
/>

### Pronume Complement

| Subiect | Complement | Exemplu |
|---------|------------|---------|
| I | me | He loves me (El mƒÉ iube»ôte) |
| You | you | I love you (Te iubesc) |
| He | him | I love him (√él iubesc) |
| She | her | I love her (O iubesc) |
| It | it | I like it (√émi place) |
| We | us | They love us (Ei ne iubesc) |
| They | them | I love them (√éi iubesc) |

## Verbul "To Be" (A Fi)

<ConjugationTable
  verb="To Be"
  meaning="a fi"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "I", polish: "am", english: "sunt" },
    { person: "You", polish: "are", english: "e»ôti" },
    { person: "He/She/It", polish: "is", english: "este" },
    { person: "We", polish: "are", english: "suntem" },
    { person: "You (pl.)", polish: "are", english: "sunte»õi" },
    { person: "They", polish: "are", english: "sunt" }
  ]}
/>

<VocabCard
  word="I am in love"
  translation="Sunt √ÆndrƒÉgostit/ƒÉ"
  pronunciation="ai em in lav"
  example="I am in love with you. (Sunt √ÆndrƒÉgostit/ƒÉ de tine.)"
/>

### Contrac»õii

√én vorbirea de zi cu zi, se folosesc contrac»õii:
- I am ‚Üí I'm
- You are ‚Üí You're
- He is ‚Üí He's
- She is ‚Üí She's
- We are ‚Üí We're
- They are ‚Üí They're

## Verbul "To Have" (A Avea)

<ConjugationTable
  verb="To Have"
  meaning="a avea"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "I", polish: "have", english: "am" },
    { person: "You", polish: "have", english: "ai" },
    { person: "He/She/It", polish: "has", english: "are" },
    { person: "We", polish: "have", english: "avem" },
    { person: "You (pl.)", polish: "have", english: "ave»õi" },
    { person: "They", polish: "have", english: "au" }
  ]}
/>

<VocabCard
  word="I have a wonderful partner"
  translation="Am un partener minunat"
  pronunciation="ai hev a uan-der-ful part-ner"
  example="I have a wonderful partner who makes me happy every day."
/>

## Timpul Prezent Simplu

√én englezƒÉ, prezentul simplu este foarte u»ôor de format:

**RegulƒÉ:** La persoana a treia singular (he, she, it) se adaugƒÉ **-s** la verb.

| PersoanƒÉ | Verb |
|----------|------|
| I love | Eu iubesc |
| You love | Tu iube»ôti |
| He/She loves | El/Ea iube»ôte |
| We love | Noi iubim |
| They love | Ei iubesc |

<VocabCard
  word="She loves me"
  translation="Ea mƒÉ iube»ôte"
  pronunciation="»ôi lavz mi"
  example="She loves me more than anything. (Ea mƒÉ iube»ôte mai mult dec√¢t orice.)"
/>

<CultureTip title="Gre»ôealƒÉ ComunƒÉ" flag="üá¨üáß">
Nu uita de -s la persoana a treia! "He love" este gre»ôit. Trebuie sƒÉ fie "He loves." Aceasta este una d√Æntre cele mai frecvente gre»ôeli ale vorbitorilor non-nativi.
</CultureTip>

## Formarea √éntrebƒÉrilor

√én englezƒÉ, √ÆntrebƒÉrile se formeazƒÉ diferit fa»õƒÉ de rom√¢nƒÉ:

### Cu verbul "To Be"
Se inverseazƒÉ subiectul cu verbul:
- You are happy ‚Üí Are you happy? (E»ôti fericit/ƒÉ?)
- He is here ‚Üí Is he here? (Este el aici?)

### Cu alte verbe (folosind DO/DOES)
- You love me ‚Üí Do you love me? (MƒÉ iube»ôti?)
- She loves you ‚Üí Does she love you? (Te iube»ôte?)

<VocabCard
  word="Do you love me?"
  translation="MƒÉ iube»ôti?"
  pronunciation="du iu lav mi"
  example="Do you love me as much as I love you?"
/>

## Formarea Nega»õiilor

### Cu "To Be"
Se adaugƒÉ "not" dupƒÉ verb:
- I am happy ‚Üí I am not happy (Nu sunt fericit/ƒÉ)
- She is here ‚Üí She is not here (Ea nu e aici)

### Cu alte verbe (folosind DO NOT / DOES NOT)
- I love ‚Üí I do not love (Nu iubesc)
- She loves ‚Üí She does not love (Ea nu iube»ôte)

**Contrac»õii:**
- do not ‚Üí don't
- does not ‚Üí doesn't
- is not ‚Üí isn't
- are not ‚Üí aren't

<VocabCard
  word="I don't want to be without you"
  translation="Nu vreau sƒÉ fiu fƒÉrƒÉ tine"
  pronunciation="ai dount uont tu bi uithaut iu"
  example="I don't want to be without you, ever."
/>

## Pronume Posesive

| Rom√¢nƒÉ | EnglezƒÉ | Exemplu |
|--------|---------|---------|
| al meu | my / mine | my love / this is mine |
| al tƒÉu | your / yours | your heart / it's yours |
| al lui | his | his eyes |
| al ei | her / hers | her smile / it's hers |
| al nostru | our / ours | our love / it's ours |
| al lor | their / theirs | their house / it's theirs |

<VocabCard
  word="My heart is yours"
  translation="Inima mea este a ta"
  pronunciation="mai hart iz iurs"
  example="My heart is yours, forever and always."
/>

## Compara»õia Adjectivelor

### Adjective Scurte (1-2 silabe)
- tall ‚Üí taller ‚Üí the tallest (√Ænalt ‚Üí mai √Ænalt ‚Üí cel mai √Ænalt)
- nice ‚Üí nicer ‚Üí the nicest (drƒÉgu»õ ‚Üí mai drƒÉgu»õ ‚Üí cel mai drƒÉgu»õ)

### Adjective Lungi (3+ silabe)
- beautiful ‚Üí more beautiful ‚Üí the most beautiful
- intelligent ‚Üí more intelligent ‚Üí the most intelligent

<VocabCard
  word="You are the most beautiful person I know"
  translation="E»ôti cea mai frumoasƒÉ persoanƒÉ pe care o cunosc"
  pronunciation="iu ar the moust biu-ti-ful per-son ai nou"
  example="You are the most beautiful person I know, inside and out."
/>


## Rezumat: Diferen»õe Cheie Rom√¢nƒÉ vs. EnglezƒÉ

| Aspect | Rom√¢nƒÉ | EnglezƒÉ |
|--------|--------|---------|
| Ordinea cuvintelor | FlexibilƒÉ | FixƒÉ (SVO) |
| Genuri gramaticale | 3 (m, f, n) | Aproape inexistente |
| DeclinƒÉri | Da | Nu |
| ConjugƒÉri | Complexe | Simple |
| Articole | Postpuse (-ul) | Antepuse (the) |

<CTA
  text="PregƒÉtit sƒÉ exersezi gramaticƒÉ englezƒÉ √Æntr-un mod distractiv?"
  buttonText="√éncepe sƒÉ √énve»õi √émpreunƒÉ"
/>

articles.title: Noorse Zinnen voor een Eerste Date
articles.content:
Een eerste date in het Noors? Hier zijn de zinnen!

## Essenti√´le zinnen

### 1. "Det er s√• hyggelig √• endelig m√∏te deg" - *dee er so hue-ge-lie o en-de-lie meu-te dai*
### 2. "Du ser fantastisk ut" - *due seer fan-tas-tiesk oet*
### 3. "Fortell meg om deg selv" - *for-tel mai om dai selv*
### 4. "Hva jobber du med?" - *va job-er due meed*
### 5. "Jeg koser meg veldig" - *jai ko-ser mai vel-die*
### 6. "Vil du ha noe mer √• drikke?" - *viel due ha noe-e meer o drie-ke*
### 7. "Hva slags musikk liker du?" - *va slaks moe-siek lie-ker due*
### 8. "Jeg vil gjerne treffe deg igjen" - *jai viel jeer-ne tre-fe dai ie-jen*
### 9. "Kan jeg f√∏lge deg hjem?" - *kan jai feul-je dai jem*
### 10. "Jeg har hatt en fantastisk kveld" - *jai har hat en fan-tas-tiesk kvel*
### 11. "Hva er hobbyene dine?" - *va er ho-bie-e-ne die-ne*
### 12. "Du har et vakkert smil" - *due har et va-kert smiel*

## Conclusie

Met deze zinnen maak je indruk op je Noorse date!

articles.title: CehƒÉ RomanticƒÉ: De la 'Miluji tƒõ' la 'Jsi m≈Øj sen'
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Ceha este o limbƒÉ melodioasƒÉ cu expresii romantice care vin direct din inimƒÉ. Cu aceste fraze, vei cuceri »ôi mai mult inimƒÉ partenerului tƒÉu ceh!

## Fraze de Dragoste Esen»õiale

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Jsi moje v≈°echno"
  translation="E»ôti totul pentru mine"
  pronunciation="ysi MO-ye VSHEKH-no"
  context="O declara»õie puternicƒÉ de dragoste totalƒÉ!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Miluji tƒõ"
  translation="Te iubesc"
  pronunciation="MI-lu-yi tyeh"
  example="Miluji tƒõ z cel√©ho srdce, l√°sko."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jsi nejkr√°snƒõj≈°√≠"
  translation="E»ôti cea mai frumoasƒÉ"
  pronunciation="ysi NEY-kras-nyey-shee"
  example="Jsi nejkr√°snƒõj≈°√≠ ≈æena na svƒõtƒõ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jsi m≈Øj sen"
  translation="E»ôti visul meu"
  pronunciation="ysi mooy sen"
  example="Jsi m≈Øj sen, kter√Ω se splnil."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Pat≈ô√≠me k sobƒõ"
  translation="Ne apar»õinem unul altuia"
  pronunciation="PAT-rzhee-me k SO-byeh"
  example="Pat≈ô√≠me k sobƒõ, to v√≠m jistƒõ."
/>

<CultureTip title="Romantismul Ceh" flag="üá®üáø">
Cehii pot pƒÉrea rezerva»õi la √Ænceput, dar √Æn intimitate sunt foarte romantici. Expresiile de dragoste √Æn cehƒÉ sunt profunde »ôi sincere!
</CultureTip>

## Complimente Romantice

<VocabCard
  word="Jsi n√°dhern√°/n√°dhern√Ω"
  translation="E»ôti superbƒÉ/superb"
  pronunciation="ysi NAD-her-na/NAD-her-nee"
  example="Vypad√°≈° dnes n√°dhernƒõ, l√°sko."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="M√°≈° kr√°sn√© oƒçi"
  translation="Ai ochi frumo»ôi"
  pronunciation="mash KRAS-ne O-chi"
  example="M√°≈° nejkr√°snƒõj≈°√≠ oƒçi, jak√© jsem kdy vidƒõl."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Tv≈Øj √∫smƒõv mƒõ dƒõl√° ≈°≈•astn√Ωm/≈°≈•astnou"
  translation="Z√¢mbetul tƒÉu mƒÉ face fericit/ƒÉ"
  pronunciation="tvooy OOS-myev mnyeh DYEH-la SHTYAS-tnim"
  example="Tv≈Øj √∫smƒõv mƒõ dƒõl√° ≈°≈•astn√Ωm ka≈æd√Ω den."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jsi dokonal√°/dokonal√Ω"
  translation="E»ôti perfectƒÉ/perfect"
  pronunciation="ysi DO-ko-na-la/DO-ko-na-lee"
  example="Pro mƒõ jsi dokonal√° takov√°, jak√° jsi."
/>

## Fraze pentru Momente Speciale

<VocabCard
  word="Chci b√Ωt nav≈ædy s tebou"
  translation="Vreau sƒÉ fiu pentru totdeauna cu tine"
  pronunciation="khtsi beet NAV-zhdi s TE-bow"
  example="Miluji tƒõ a chci b√Ωt nav≈ædy s tebou."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jsi to nejlep≈°√≠, co mƒõ potkalo"
  translation="E»ôti cel mai bun lucru care mi s-a √Ænt√¢mplat"
  pronunciation="ysi to NEY-lep-shee tso mnyeh POT-ka-lo"
  example="Jsi to nejlep≈°√≠, co mƒõ v ≈æivotƒõ potkalo."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Bez tebe bych nemohl/a ≈æ√≠t"
  translation="FƒÉrƒÉ tine nu a»ô putea trƒÉi"
  pronunciation="bez TE-be bikh NE-mo-hul/a zhit"
  example="Bez tebe bych nemohla ≈æ√≠t, jsi moje v≈°echno."
